verbs.description: [V: Could] Donald Trump do a more thorough job if it was his goal to ruin the United States ?
[ARGM-MOD: Could] [ARG0: Donald Trump] [V: do] [ARG1: a more thorough job] [ARGM-ADV: if it was his goal to ruin the United States] ?
Could Donald Trump do a more thorough job if it [V: was] [ARG2: his goal] [ARG1: to ruin the United States] ?
Could Donald Trump do a more thorough job if it was his goal to [V: ruin] [ARG1: the United States] ?
